Hi Hearts,🚀 “Agile is not your goal—it’s only the best way to achieve your goals.” 🚀 Put your thinking caps on because the Agile Quiz Competition is happening TODAY! Are you ready to put your knowledge to the test and win fantastic prizes? Today at 5:00 PM, let's determine who takes home the title of champion!  🌟       SEE YOU THERE! https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_ZmRkYTM0YzctMDY5OC00ZWFlLWIyZGQtYzNiMGE1NzA3NzM0%40thread.v2/0?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%22d5e769b0-fd19-45e4-a4a8-b73545450234%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%220b9e5438-5dc2-4530-83bb-8cf3c4400ce3%22%7d  Best Regards,Project Management Initiative
